method.name: Subscribe
method.tp:docstring: Subscribe to one or more keys

arg.name: keys
arg.tp:docstring: An array of the keys to subscribe to.

arg.name: values
arg.tp:docstring: A Value_Set mapping the requested keys to their current values.

arg.name: undeterminable_keys
arg.tp:docstring: An array of keys which we couldn't determine the values for.

arg.name: values
arg.tp:docstring: A Value_Set mapping the changed keys to their values.

arg.name: undeterminable_keys
arg.tp:docstring: An array of keys which we can no longer determine the values for.

method.name: Unsubscribe
method.tp:docstring: Unsubscribe from one or more keys

arg.name: keys
arg.tp:docstring: An array of the keys to unsubscribe from.
